properties.headline: Lakeshore Flood Advisory issued January 8 at 4:25PM EST until January 10 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Marquette MI
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Marquette has issued a Lakeshore
Flood Advisory...which is in effect from 11 AM Thursday to 1 AM
EST Friday.

* Winds...Southeast to south winds 25 to 30 mph, with gusts to 40
mph.

* Waves...8 to 10 feet, with occasionally higher waves possible
especially east of Manistique and over to Seul Choix Point.

* Impacts...Minor lakeshore flooding, and beach and shoreline
erosion are expected.
properties.instruction:
A Lakeshore Flood Advisory indicates that onshore winds and waves
will generate flooding of low areas along the lakeshore.

NWSheadline: LAKESHORE FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THURSDAY TO 1 AM EST FRIDAY
